item.description:
The touch rugby season in Southie starts up again June 7th and we are trying to get a team together.  The games are at Moakley park near JFK, at 6:30pm every Thursday from June 7th until August 9th.  Complimentary appetizers are served at the Banshee after every game. It is a mixed comp and we need at least 2 girls in the team, so if you know anyone who is interested in playing please let me know.  Previous rugby experience is not required...

A team costs $200 to register, so the more people we get, the cheaper it is per person.

If you are keen to play or want more info please contact Jon on (617) 686 5404 or mangist@gmail.com

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Touch rugby in Southie
